mitar 200 isawwe hitapu olimpik suriya jameyikawe weronika kambal brawun labana masa milros krida ulele amarika, jameyika abhiyogatha tharagayata sahabhagi wana bawa sanwidhakayo pawasathi.2008 bijin olimpik ulele di jameyikanu keti dura dhawana kridaka kridikawan wethin labu parajaya maka damimata mewara milros krida ulele di amarikawa uthsaha ganu atha.dewathawakadima mitar 200 isawwa wenuwen olimpik ran padakkam dinu weronika mitar 60 gruhastha krida loka suriyada wanniya. 2007 wasare mitar 100 loka suriya wimata da aya samath wuwa ya.milros krida ulele di amerikanu dhawana suriyan thidenaku ha jameyikanu dhawana suriyan thidenaku abhiyogatha kusalanaya sandaha tharaga wadimata niyamithaya..
